pullRequest.title: integration test for ipc aware service
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of changes:
Added end-end integration test for ipc aware service setting its state to running
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

commit.message: integration test for ipc aware service

nodes.bodyText: Even though this only has 1 test, if we added more they would probably break because this is AfterAll. Can you switch these to be BeforeEach and AfterEach so that when we add more tests they still work?
Don't swallow the output from the execution since that may be helpful when there are issues. If you just want to quiet down mvn, then use mvn -q.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+---
+
+#launchers:
+plain:
+  startup:
+    all: "{platform.invoke} {args}"
+
+
+main:
+  requires: IPCService
+  startup:
+    mvn exec:java -f $EVERGREEN_HOME/pom.xml -Dexec.mainClass="com.aws.iot.evergreen.ipc.ipcawareservices.ServiceMovesToRunning" -Dexec.classpathScope="test" > /dev/null 2>&1
